page.title: 14Recreation
page.content: In Penyffordd there are quite a few recreational facilities.To start with there are a number of public houses for instance the Red Lion,Millshone and the White Lion.Also there is a British Legion Club.They are frequented mainly by men.In the pubs you can choose to play dominoes,darts and pool.The Red Lion has a Sunday league football team.There is also several youth football teams in penyfford.They are members of local youth leagues.The local people have a number of canon league teams which are not too far away.They are Wrexham, Chester, Liverpool and Everton. Some travel to watch Manchester United.Just outside the area in Padeswood there are 2 golf clubs.For the younger people in Penyffordd there is a social group and brownies pack.
